items.title: Restaurant Chains Are Forecasting Better Results This Year. Here's Why Investors Should Think Twice About Believing Them
items.description: It's been a tough start to the year for restaurant chains.  People are scaling back on spending due to uncertain economic conditions, and restaurants aren't able to simply rely on price hikes to boost their top lines anymore.  Here's why they could be wrong, and why investors may want to exercise caution when looking at buying restaurant stocks right now.
